com.box.sdk

Class BoxJSONResponse

  • Object
    • BoxAPIResponse
      • BoxJSONResponse

  • public class BoxJSONResponse
extends BoxAPIResponse
    Used to read HTTP responses containing JSON from the Box API.

    This request type extends BoxAPIResponse to provide additional functionality for handling JSON strings. It reads the response body into a string and allows the JSON in the response to be logged.

      Constructs a BoxAPIResponse with an http response code and response body.

    • Method Detail

      • getJsonObject

        public JsonObject getJsonObject()
        Get response as Json Object.
        Returns:
        response as JsonObject

      • getJSON

        public String getJSON()
        Gets the body of the response as a JSON string. When this method is called, the response's body will be read and the response will be disconnected, meaning that the stream returned by BoxAPIResponse.getBody() can no longer be used.
        Returns:
        the body of the response as a JSON string.

      • bodyToString

        protected String bodyToString()
        Description copied from class: BoxAPIResponse
        Returns a string representation of this response's body. This method is used when logging this response's body. By default, it returns an empty string (to avoid accidentally logging binary data) unless the response contained an error message.
        Overrides:
        bodyToString in class BoxAPIResponse
        Returns:
        a string representation of this response's body.
